clinical_history: Patient with unexplained weight loss and fever.
findings: Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Focal uptake in cervical lymph nodes consistent with post-surgical changes.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in cervical lymph nodes with SUVmax 10.31.
recommendations: Clinical correlation recommended with prior imaging.
